text:
The ANTLR task should support <fileset> and <filelist> nested elements so that multiple 
grammars can be specified. <filelist> support is important in the case where some grammars 
depend on be building of other grammars.

A patch was previously sent to ant-dev that added the 
above functionality. If that patch is accepted, I will also submit a patch for the doc changes.
creator: jrr@silverstream.com
